title: Declare Multiple Variables
text: To declare more than one variable of the same type, use a comma-separated list:
You can also assign the same value to multiple variables of the same type:

examples.heading: Example
examples.code: int x = 5, y = 6, z = 50;printf("%d", x + y + z);

examples.heading: Example
examples.code: int x, y, z;x = y = z = 50;printf("%d", x + y + z);
